description:
IMPORTANT: If you are still on v1.0.5, remove it before installing v1.0.8. More information is available on the app support site, http://at0700.hjitconsulting.com/category/apps/popscicomplus/changelog-popscicomplus-apps/

Read the latest news on gadgets, cars, science, technology and DIY from popsci.com on your Palm WebOS device. The main page shows current feature stories whilst the menu buttons provide access to all popular categories from popsci.com. 

The following features and enhancements has been added to PopSci.com+: 
- Twitter integration. You can now tweet a popsci.com article title or article image. When sending a tweet, image and article links are shortened using tinyurl.com integration 
- Choice out of four icon sets for the menu bar 
- Hide images to conserve data usage 
- The Palm icon on the main screen switches between menu's 
- You can now listen to popsci.com podcasts as well 
- Article now include related articles 
- All articles available from popsci.com can now be viewed (use the arrow button next to the category title)

Version 1.0.8
- Bug fix in Gadget category view

Version 1.0.7
- Replaced Palm logo icon

Version 1.0.6
- Trial period extended to May 5th
- Cars category won't load has been fixed
- Fixed limit on number of pages that can be viewed when navigating article history

Version 1.0.5
- Main page won't load issue resolved. Caused by articles with no author's specified
- Added support to handle articles that cannot be retrieved. These articles will be marked as red
- Articles marked red will be skipped when navigation with the forwar/backward button in article view mode
